title: [Large-Scale] 360° VR-Based Mechanical Ventilation Management Training for ICU Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental respiratory physiology and basic critical care nursing skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining VR simulations and LMS for practicing intensive care unit nurses.

learning_goals: ICU nurses can perform mechanical ventilation alarm response protocols at 80% accuracy within 5 minutes via 360° VR simulation
After VR simulation based on real clinical scenarios, learners achieve 30% higher scores in clinical judgment assessments compared to baseline
Trainees score ≥4.5/5.0 on mechanical ventilation management self-efficacy surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
